relation.text: Summer , very retired , but still chearful , & I hope
is ill treated by five of his Children ; Mary the youngest girl , & who is my god-daughter , has a good disposition & a understanding , her I had with me for two months
now return 'd to the Miſs Duttons ; & I flatter
is come to me , she has been at Bruſsels for near two years
now is ; but she far exceeds
my protection , not only that , but my house shall be her home , till her father returns from Paris ; where he has been fifteen Months
six Months last past ; I am afraid this is a wild project , & not unlike himself ; my Dear Mr. Glover never approv
heard which was about a week ago
Affectionate Sister M—— G—— Mrs Glover Octbr 1786
